Post.title: PHPglobal$GLOBALS['']
Post.content:
$GLOBALS[var] $var
global $var $var


test()$var1$va2global$var1$var2 $var2 = &$var1; $var2$var2$var1$var2$var2$var1

:

$GLOBALS[var]
global $var $var = &$GLOBALS['var']


unset
global $GLOBALS

phpglobalglobal$GLOBALS[]

2$b$b

git

yes

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post._content:
### hexo
 Github PagesHTMLJekyllHexo

JekyRubyJekyRubyWindowsRuby HexoNodeJsWindowsNodeJs
JekyllWEBHexoWEB
nodejshexo
### hexo
nodejsnpmNPMNodeJSNPM
`$ npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org`
<!-- more -->
cnpmnpmblog,, Git Bash
`$ cnpm install -g hexo-cli`
WARN
`$ cnpm install hexo --save`

`$ hexo -v`
`$ hexo init` #

`$ hexo clean`
`$ hexo generate`
`$ hexo deploy`

`$ hexo new "postName" ` #
`$ hexo new page "pageName" ` #
`$ hexo generate ` #public
`$ hexo server ` #4000'ctrl + c'server
`$ hexo deploy ` #.deployGitHub
`$ hexo help  ` #
`$ hexo version  ` #Hexo
### hexo
`_config.yml`:  
`package.json`:
`scaffolds`:Hexoscaffold 
`source`:posts()/MarkdownHTMLpublic
`themes`: Hexo
### hexo
_config.yml`skip_render`
1.sourcedemo.html
`skip_render: demo.html`
2.sourcedemo
`skip_render: demo/*`
3.sourcedemo.html
`skip_render: demo/*.html`
4.sourcedemo
`skip_render: demo/**`
5.
```
skip_render:
    - demo.html
    - demo/*
    - demo/**
```

Post.title: Http
Post._content:
> * 2XX
> * 3XX
> * 4XX
> * 5XX

 HTTP API 
<!-- more -->

| | Label           |   |
|------ |:---------------:| :----- |
| 200   | OK |  body |
| 201   | Created |  POST  |
| 202   | Accepted  |  body  |
| 204   | No Content |  PUT  metadata |
| 301   | Moved Permanently |  Location  POST  GET |
| 304   | Not Modified | conditional request |
| 307   | Temporary Redirect |  |
| 308   | Permanent Redirect |  301  |
| 400   | Bad Requests  | body body  |
| 401   | Unauthorized  |  |
| 403   | Forbidden |  |
| 404   | Not Found |  URL  |
| 405   | Method Not Allowed |  Allow  |
| 415   | Unsupported Media Type    |  Content-Type  Content-Encoding  xml Json |
| 429   | Too Many Requests |  |
| 500   | Internal Server Error |  |
| 503   | Service Unavailable |  Retry-After  |

 API  [HTTP Status Code](https://httpstatuses.com/)  [RFC7231 Response Status Codes](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6)

HTTP API

Label

201 Created POST
202 Accepted body
204 No Content PUT metadata
301 Moved Permanently Location POST GET
304 Not Modified conditional request
307 Temporary Redirect

400 Bad Requests body body
401 Unauthorized
403 Forbidden
404 Not Found URL
405 Method Not Allowed Allow
415 Unsupported Media Type Content-Type Content-Encoding xml Json

503 Service Unavailable Retry-After
